name: Untitled Shape Game
description:
A small game made for the Gamejam of November 2022 hosted by the Association de Développement Vidéoludique de l'Université de Montréal. The theme was "Redemption". An easy platformer trying to add puzzle elements.

Try your platforming skill and wits in three levels with differents mechanics and different avatar. Play as the Circle who can slow time, but can only move horizontally. Or play as the Triangle who can set up a point a point to teleport to, but can only move using small hops. Then again play as the Square who hasn't any power, but has full range of movement and can walljump. All of this in the name of redeeming the shape theory from being sus.

Alexis Du Sablon - Programming & Level Design
Francis Gladu - Sound Design & Ressource Manager
Rémy Da Costa Faro - Programming
Rose Stoyanoff - Visual Style & Character Design

A game from Untitled Game Company - Toujours plus mieux
